original_title: アオラレ 危険運転者に抜かずの連撃中出しされた免許取りたて女子大生の末路
overview: Moko Sakura is a university student who finally gets her driver’s license.  She is very nervous about driving in the city, and sure enough, she had an incident with a middle-aged guy. Sakura also learns about instant karma as the guy drags her to his van to settle the incident.
title: Tailgater – The End Of A Newly Licensed College Girl At The Hands Of A Dangerous Driver By Creampie Sex Moko Sakura
